name: BuddyNS Plesk Extension
body:
![BuddyNS Logo](https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1344219585/buddyns-logo-small_400x400.png)
This extension adds to plesk's custom-backend dns feature to create, update and remove zones as plesk does.  buddyns.php is registered as a custom backend, and Plesk will pass the zone data to the script via stdin. API Calls to BuddyNS are made via php cURL.

**After Installing, you'll still need to follow the instructions at [BuddyNS AXFR Setup](https://www.buddyns.com/support/setup/) to allow buddyNS to transfer your zones.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
